course.unit_title: Present Perfect with Yet/Already - Sports: Olympic Games

content.tts_en: Starting unit 36. Topic: Sports: Olympic Games. Focus: Present Perfect with Yet/Already.

content.stimulus_en: The actress has ___ taught music in school - interesting.
The artist has yet checked a camera in the country (today).
content.stimulus_es: Ref: The artist ya ha checked a camera en the country (today).

pairs.right: We has already planned a movie in school - interesting.

pairs.right: The teacher has already sent a letter in the park - amazing.

pairs.right: She has already spoken coffee in Paris - amazing.

pairs.right: The baker has already watched a house in the bank (now).

content.correct_answer: The singer has already bought an apple in the bank (today).

items.text: Cabe destacar que la palabra every es singular en inglés, por tanto, tanto «day» como cualquiera de los días que pongamos, deben ir en singular. Es incorrecto decir.
Qué es lo que empieza? (today)
angry / Our / teacher / English / usually / is - 220

matches.text: every days o every Tuesdays..
Our English teacher is usually angry - 220
la película, entonces SUBJECT = THE FILM (today)

items.text: I have my English classes on Tuesdays and Thursdays puedo poner los días en plural, ya que es todos los martes y todos los jueves, no sólo uno. - 112
